TextEng: "Why would I free kobolds? You can die along with your masters."
Text: "왜 내가 코볼트를 풀어주겠어? 네 주인들과 함께 죽어."

TextEng: "Forget it. Time to die." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
"Yes, I'm here to kill the beholders. You're one of their slaves, I take it?"
Text: "그래, 주시자들을 죽이러 왔어. 넌 그들의 노예 중 하나겠지?"

TextEng: "Good. Then you won't mind if I kill you." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
"I've other questions you can answer."
Text: "네가 대답할 수 있는 다른 질문들이 있어."

TextEng: "Then don't worry about it."
"Just for you to die." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I'll spare you if you answer. We can get along, here."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "대답하면 살려줄게. 여기서 잘 지낼 수 있어."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "You'll answer my questions or suffer the consequences."
"That's all the questions I have."
"What's the easiest way to kill these beholders?"
Text: "이 주시자들을 죽이는 가장 쉬운 방법이 뭐야?"

TextEng: "There are more slaves like yourself?"
"Would you fight for your freedom?"
"Then you're of no use to me." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
"Tell me what you know about these tunnels."
"What are you doing here?"
"What ruins are you talking about?"
"What was so special about the stone you brought them?"
"Tell me what you know about these beholders."
"Fine. Time for you to die." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
"Drow emissary?"
"Tell me about this Beholder Tyrant."
<StartCheck>[Bluff]</Start> "I'm not here to kill anyone. I'm an emissary to the beholders."
Text: <StartCheck>[허세]</Start> "난 아무도 죽이러 온 게 아니야. 주시자들에게 온 사절이야."

TextEng: "I'm not going to bother with you further. Time to go."
Text: "더 이상 너한테 신경 안 쓸 거야. 갈 시간이야."

TextEng: "Should have ran while you had the chance, fool." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
"Hands off. I'm not doing kobolds any favors."
Text: "손 떼. 코볼트한테 호의 베풀 생각 없어."

TextEng: "I'll free your friends if I can."
"I'll kill whatever gets in my way. Period."
"Too smart for your own good, creature. Time to die!" <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
"So you're not going to warn the beholders I'm here?"
Text: "그러면 주시자들에게 내가 여기 있다고 알리지 않을 거야?"

TextEng: "Then I'll leave you be."
"Not good enough. I can't trust you." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
Text: "충분하지 않아. 널 믿을 수 없어." <StartAction>[그를 공격한다.]</Start>

TextEng: "Then maybe you'll answer some of my questions."
"Then tell me what you know about these beholders."
Text: "그럼 이 주시자들에 대해 아는 걸 말해봐."

TextEng: "You talk too much, kobold. Time to die." <StartAction>[Attack him.]</Start>
Text: "넌 말이 너무 많아, 코볼트. 죽을 시간이야." <StartAction>[그를 공격한다.]</Start>

TextEng: "Yes, that's correct. I should be going now."
"What is the Beholder Tyrant?"
"Who is this drow emissary you mentioned?"
"I have some questions for you."
"I'd like to talk to you, first. Do you have a name?"
Text: "먼저 얘기 좀 하고 싶어. 이름이 있어?"

TextEng: "I should be going, now."
"Wait... slow down. Who are you?"
"I haven't cut your tongue out yet... but that could change."
Text: "아직 네 혀를 자르지 않았는데... 바뀔 수도 있어."

TextEng: "I wouldn't cut out your tongue... even though I hate your singing."
Text: "네 혀를 자르진 않을 거야... 네 노래가 싫긴 해도."

TextEng: "Of course not. Then you couldn't sing for us."
Text: "당연히 안 하지. 그러면 우리한테 노래를 못 해주잖아."
